<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Charmed Life](/Feats.aspx?ID=6138) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 165 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Charisma +2

**Trigger**
You attempt a saving throw, but you haven’t rolled yet.

</column>

---

When danger calls, you have a strange knack for coming out on top. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the triggering save. If you succeed on the triggering saving throw, you gain panache until the end of your next turn.

<title level="2">Charmed Life leads to...</title>
[Incredible Luck](/Feats.aspx?ID=6178)
name: Charmed Life
